ne15:3.4: Taniyeva asekkhani pancindriyani, ayam indriyehi otarana.
ne15:4.1: Taniyeva asekkhani pancindriyani vijja, vijjuppada avijjanirodho, avijjanirodha sankharanirodho, sankharanirodha vinnananirodho, vinnananirodha namarupanirodho, namarupanirodha salayatananirodho, salayatananirodha phassanirodho, phassanirodha vedananirodho, vedananirodha tanhanirodho, tanhanirodha upadananirodho, upadananirodha bhavanirodho, bhavanirodha jatinirodho, jatinirodha jaramaranam sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupayasa nirujjhanti.
ne15:5.1: Taniyeva asekkhani pancindriyani tihi khandhehi sangahitani—
ne15:5.2: silakkhandhena samadhikkhandhena pannakkhandhena, ayam khandhehi otarana.
ne15:6.1: Taniyeva asekkhani pancindriyani sankharapariyapannani ye sankhara anasava, no ca bhavanga, te sankhara dhammadhatusangahita.
ne15:7.1: Sa dhammadhatu dhammayatanapariyapanna, yam ayatanam anasavam, no ca bhavangam.
ne15:8.1: “Ayam ahasmiti ananupassi”ti ayam sakkayaditthiya samugghato, sa sekkhavimutti, taniyeva sekkhani pancindriyani.
ne15:9.1: Taniyeva sekkhani pancindriyani vijja, vijjuppada avijjanirodho, avijjanirodha sankharanirodho, evam sabbo paticcasamuppado.
ne15:11.1: Sayeva vijja sankharapariyapanna, ye sankhara anasava, no ca bhavanga, te sankhara dhammadhatusangahita, ayam dhatuhi otarana.
ne15:12.1: Sa dhammadhatu dhammayatanapariyapanna, yam ayatanam anasavam, no ca bhavangam, ayam ayatanehi otarana.
ne15:13.1: Sekkhaya ca vimuttiya asekkhaya ca vimuttiya vimutto udatari ogham atinnapubbam apunabbhavaya.
ne15:14.1: “Nissitassa calitam, anissitassa calitam natthi, calite asati passaddhi, passaddhiya sati nati na hoti, natiya asati agatigati na hoti, agatigatiya asati cutupapato na hoti, cutupapate asati nevidha na huram na ubhayamantarena esevanto dukkhassa”ti.
ne15:15.1: “Nissitassa calitan”ti nissayo nama duvidho tanhanissayo ca ditthinissayo ca.
ne15:15.2: Tattha ya rattassa cetana, ayam tanhanissayo;
ne15:15.4: Cetana pana sankhara, sankharapaccaya vinnanam, vinnanapaccaya namarupam, evam sabbo paticcasamuppado.
ne15:16.1: Tattha ya rattassa vedana, ayam sukha vedana.
ne15:16.2: Ya sammulhassa vedana, ayam adukkhamasukha vedana, ima dve vedana vedanakkhandho.
ne15:17.1: Tattha sukha vedana dve indriyani sukhindriyam somanassindriyanca, adukkhamasukha vedana upekkhindriyam.
ne15:18.1: Taniyeva indriyani sankharapariyapannani, ye sankhara sasava bhavanga, te sankhara dhammadhatusangahita.
ne15:19.1: Sa dhammadhatu dhammayatanapariyapanna, yam ayatanam sasavam bhavangam, ayam ayatanehi otarana.
ne15:20.1: “Anissitassa calitam natthi”ti samathavasena va tanhaya anissito vipassanavasena va ditthiya anissito.
ne15:20.2: Ya vipassana ayam vijja, vijjuppada avijjanirodho, avijjanirodha sankharanirodho, sankharanirodha vinnananirodho, evam sabbo paticcasamuppado.
ne15:23.1: Sayeva vipassana sankharapariyapanna, ye sankhara anasava, no ca bhavanga, te sankhara dhammadhatusangahita.
ne15:24.1: Sa dhammadhatu dhammayatanapariyapanna, yam ayatanam anasavam, no ca bhavangam.
ne15:25.1: “Passaddhiya sati”ti duvidha passaddhi kayika ca cetasika ca.
ne15:25.3: Yam cetasikam sukham, ayam cetasika passaddhi.
ne15:25.4: Passaddhakayo sukham vediyati, sukhino cittam samadhiyati, samahito yathabhutam pajanati, yathabhutam pajananto nibbindati, nibbindanto virajjati, viraga vimuccati, vimuttasmim “vimuttam”iti nanam hoti, “khina jati, vusitam brahmacariyam, katam karaniyam, naparam itthattaya”ti pajanati.
ne15:25.5: So na namati rupesu, na saddesu, na gandhesu, na rasesu, na photthabbesu, na dhammesu khaya ragassa khaya dosassa khaya mohassa yena rupena tathagatam titthantam carantam pannapayamano pannapeyya, tassa rupassa khaya viraga nirodha caga patinissagga rupasankhaye vimutto, tathagato atthitipi na upeti, natthitipi na upeti, atthi natthitipi na upeti, nevatthi no natthitipi na upeti.
ne15:25.6: Atha kho gambhiro appameyyo asankheyyo nibbutotiyeva sankham gacchati khaya ragassa, khaya dosassa, khaya mohassa.
ne15:26.4: Yena vinnanena tathagatam titthantam carantam pannapayamano pannapeyya, tassa vinnanassa khaya viraga nirodha caga patinissagga vinnanasankhaye vimutto, tathagato atthitipi na upeti, natthitipi na upeti, atthi natthitipi na upeti, nevatthi no natthitipi na upeti.
ne15:26.5: Atha kho gambhiro appameyyo asankheyyo nibbutotiyeva sankham gacchati khaya ragassa, khaya dosassa, khaya mohassa.
ne15:26.8: Agatigatipi na bhavanti, “nevidha”ti chasu ajjhattikesu ayatanesu.
ne15:26.10: “Na ubhayamantarena”ti phassasamuditesu dhammesu attanam na passati.
ne15:26.12: So duvidho lokiyo ca lokuttaro ca.
ne15:26.13: Tattha lokiyo avijjapaccaya sankhara, yava jaramarana.
ne15:26.14: Lokuttaro silavato avippatisaro jayati, yava naparam itthattayati pajanati.
ne15:26.15: Tenaha bhagava “nissitassa calitam anissitassa calitam natthi …pe…
ne15:29.1: “Ye keci soka paridevita va, dukkha ca lokasmimanekarupa piyam paticcappabhavanti ete”ti—
ne15:30.1: Vedanapaccaya tanha, tanhapaccaya upadanam, upadanapaccaya bhavo, bhavapaccaya jati, jatipaccaya jaramaranam, evam sabbam.
ne15:32.1: Taniyeva indriyani sankharapariyapannani, ye sankhara sasava bhavanga, te sankhara dhammadhatusangahita.
ne15:33.1: Sa dhammadhatu dhammayatanapariyapanna, yam ayatanam sasavam bhavangam.
ne15:35.2: Tanhanirodha upadananirodho, upadananirodha bhavanirodho, evam sabbam.
ne15:36.2: So samatho dve indriyani satindriyam samadhindriyanca.
ne15:38.1: Soyeva samatho sankharapariyapanno, ye sankhara anasava, no ca bhavanga, te sankhara dhammadhatusangahita.
ne15:39.1: Sa dhammadhatu dhammayatanapariyapanna, yam ayatanam anasavam, no ca bhavangam.
ne15:43.3: Anunayam patighanca pana tanhapakkho, tanhaya ca pana dasarupini ayatanani padatthanam.
ne15:44.1: Taniyeva dasa rupini rupakayo namasampayutto, tadubhayam namarupam, namarupapaccaya salayatanam, salayatanapaccaya phasso, phassapaccaya vedana, vedanapaccaya tanha, evam sabbam.
ne15:47.1: Tattha yo rupakayo imani panca rupini indriyani, yo namakayo imani panca arupini indriyani, imani dasa indriyani.
ne15:50.1: Ayam saupadisesa nibbanadhatu, ayam dhatuhi otarana.
ne15:51.1: Sayeva saupadisesa nibbanadhatu vijja, vijjuppada avijjanirodho, avijjanirodha sankharanirodho, evam sabbam.
ne15:54.1: Sayeva vijja sankharapariyapanna, ye sankhara anasava, no ca bhavanga, te sankhara dhammadhatusangahita.
ne15:55.1: Sa dhammadhatu dhammayatanapariyapanna, yam ayatanam anasavam, no ca bhavangam.
